title: さかなとつき
description: A charming story about a lonely fish who dreams of visiting the moon and asks other sea creatures for advice on how to reach it.

pages.title: The Lonely Fish
pages.description: A lonely fish looks up at the moon through the water

sentences.海の中に、一匹の魚が住んでいました。: In the ocean, there lived a fish.
sentences.毎晩、月を見上げては、月に行きたいと思っていました。: Every night, looking up at the moon, he wished he could go to the moon.

pages.title: The Fish's Dream
pages.description: The fish dreams of reaching the moon and decides to ask for help

sentences.「月は、どうやって行けるのだろう？」: How can I get to the moon?

pages.title: Meeting the Whale
pages.description: The fish asks the wise whale for advice

sentences.「クジラさん、月に行くにはどうすればいいですか？」: Mr. Whale, how can I get to the moon?
sentences.クジラは深く考えてから言いました。: The whale thought deeply and then said.

pages.title: The Whale's Advice
pages.description: The whale gives philosophical advice about dreams

sentences.「月は遠い場所にあるけれど、夢を持つことは大切だよ。: The moon is far away, but it's important to have dreams.
sentences.魚は、少し元気になりました。: The fish felt a little better.

pages.title: Meeting the Turtle
pages.description: The fish asks the patient turtle for advice

sentences.「カメさん、月に行く方法を知っていますか？」: Mr. Turtle, do you know how to get to the moon?

pages.title: The Turtle's Wisdom
pages.description: The turtle shares ancient wisdom about patience

pages.title: Meeting the Crab
pages.description: The fish asks the clever crab for practical advice

sentences.「カニさん、月に行くにはどうすればいいですか？」: Mr. Crab, how can I get to the moon?
sentences.カニは鋏をカチカチ鳴らしながら考えました。: The crab thought while clicking his claws.

pages.title: The Crab's Solution
pages.description: The crab offers a practical but impossible solution

sentences.「月に行くには、空を飛ばなければならないよ。: To go to the moon, you have to fly through the sky.

pages.title: The Fish's Realization
pages.description: The fish realizes something important about his quest

sentences.魚は、少し悲しくなりました。: The fish became a little sad.
sentences.でも、友達ができて、寂しくなくなりました。: But he made friends and wasn't lonely anymore.
sentences.月に行けなくても、海の中は楽しい場所でした。: Even if he couldn't go to the moon, the ocean was a fun place.

pages.title: The Moon's Reflection
pages.description: The fish realizes the moon is always with him through its reflection

sentences.今、魚は新しい夢を持っています。: Now the fish has a new dream.
sentences.「海の中を探検して、もっと友達を作ろう！」: Let me explore the ocean and make more friends!
sentences.水に映る月が微笑んでいる。: The moon smiles in the water's reflection.
sentences.月は、いつも自分のそばにいるのだと。: The moon is always with him.
